info.title: OpenEdusync API
info.description: API documentation for the OpenEdusy application

get.description: Retrieve a paginated list of Building with optional search
Retrieve a Building by its ID

post.description: Create a new Building with the provided details

put.description: Update an existing Building with the provided details

delete.description: Delete a Building by its ID
